channel.title: WannaCry on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration
channel.description: Recent content in WannaCry on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration

item.title: Continuing ransomware analysis with WannaCry
item.description: This blog article analyses WannaCry Ransomware of 2017. This post uses various static and dynamic analysis methods to unpick and analyse key indicators of this variant of malware.
